<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 28 Jun, 2014
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5| ffur2007slx2_5]]
<dd class="note">
(ArmA3 1.22) Algorithm:
<code>Vector = [x,y,z]; 
Result = [[sqrt]] ((x ^ 2) + (y ^ 2) + (z ^ 2));
</code>
It is recommended to use [[vectorMagnitude]] instead of [[BIS_fnc_magnitude]].
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
